features: 🌌【Ultra Quiet】 The Blades design of this small desk fan has been upgraded with new technology and high quality ABS. So our table fan advanced the sound 25% quieter than others. The min noise is close to 25db, and the max noise is under 50db. It is suitable for you to use in working and studying.

🌌【180° Vertical Rotation】 The stand of this desktop fan can be rotated 180°to adjust the wind angles which you need. It allows cooling at various angles and improving airflow in small rooms. The portable fan is in classic look and good quality. It can give you the better tactile feeling and prolong the use of the fan.

🌌【3 Speeds Strong Airflow】 There are 3 kinds of airflow can be adjusted by pressing the button. Speed 1(Blue Light): slight wind, 2.2m/s, 1600rpm; Speed 2(Green Light): cool wind 3.2m/s, 2200rpm; Speed 3(Red Light): strong wind, 4.0m/s, 2600rpm. There will surely be one to meet your needs.

🌌【Dual Power Supply】 The rechargeable fan is built in 2000mAh battery, and it can also be powered by USB. You can plug it into the power supply for the lasting working or use the battery for the portable working. The light indicator is red when in charging , it will turns green when fully charged.

🌌【Portable】 The personal fan is with compact size (7.1*5.7*1.4inches) and weight (0.56lb). The size of the blade is 4 inch. Small and lightweight portable fan is easy to carry. And it is perfect for home, bedroom, office, desk, beach, camping or anywhere you need to make your day cool.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this fan!
reviews.reviewText: I love this fan! It perfectly suited my needs as I wanted something thin, lightweight, portable and rechargeable. It has all those features and it works great! It is quiet, yet powerful and adjustable too.I got this for a trip to Hawaii as I cannot sleep if I'm too hot and this was just right! I really love that I can charge it up and the battery lasts and lasts! I had purchased another small fan last year but it only works if plugged into a USB port so it's very limited. (It works great on my desk though! LOL)I'm so happy with this purchase and would recommend it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for travel
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this fan to use when traveling. I love it. The fan is very quiet, folds flat for easy packing. It has a rechargeable battery or runs off of usb cable. Perfect size to use on nightstand.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very Good Value for the Price
reviews.reviewText: Absolutely love these. Have bought three. One in my bag, one at work, one next to the bed. They are thin and small but can cool like a big fan. Easy to take anywhere. Love how they are rechargeable! Hotflashes are a bit easier now. Several coworkers and friends have also bought these.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for window ledge counter dividing kitchen/LR
reviews.reviewText: I needed a tiny yellow fan to perch on the counter over my kitchen sink. It provides a little breeze on my face as i do the dishes, or cook so i don't have to fire up the central ac. It's tiny and foldable (lending itself to several different applications) and it propels the air at 3 different strengths. It's nice to have it charged up and ready to use if the power goes out on warm days. In fact, if it lasts for a year, i may buy another.2 week update:It continues to get high marks for looks; perky yellow is cute as a bug's ear. However, i've barely used it (under 2 hours of total operation to date) and it needs re-charging already. (Oh, and that's with having charged it for a full 8 hour overnight out of the box.) So to all those reviewers claiming it runs for hours and hours on one charge: NOT-- at least that's not my finding. However, when it is charged (or plugged in) it offers good relief in my kitchen.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great travel item
reviews.reviewText: I normally sleep at home with a fan on me. My wife doesn't like it, so we don't use the ceiling fan, I have a small fan on my nightstand that only hits me. When we travel, I always miss the fan. Not any more! This fan is slim, so it's very easy to pack; the battery life is amazing, it lasts the entire night and then some; the noise level is minimal; and the variable speeds are a great convenience. I've also used it at other times, and it's great. I can't think of a single negative thing about this fan. Great product at a surprisingly low price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These little fans are awesome. I ordered one and my grandson stole it so ordered another. Bery sturdy and work great. No batteries which is a plus and they hold a charge for quite awhile.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Can't sleep without it!
reviews.reviewText: My husband and I cruise a couple of times a year. I have to sleep with a fan on if I have any hope of getting a good night's sleep. This fan is rechargeable and it will fold flat for easy storage. It is small enough that I can direct it just at me and my husband doesn't feel it. There are two speed settings and I kept it on low. The high setting was too cold even for me! Wonderful product - would definitely recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect bedside fan
reviews.reviewText: I loved it so much I had to order one for my mom and sisters. Quiet enough to run all night by the bedside. Also works great to keep cool while applying makeup or cooking in the kitchen. Love that it’s wireless and the folding design makes it easy to pack in a travel bag.
